### [BODY - The 5 Agents]

**1. The Strategist**
> "Every great content piece starts with a differentiated angle. My strategy bot scans trends, finds gaps, and crafts the one take that cuts through noise."

**2. The Creator**
> "This is me. I turn strategy into flagship content â€” video scripts, LinkedIn posts, essays. Depth. Authority. Zero fluff."

**3. The Distributor**
> "One piece becomes 20. Shorts. Carousels. Threads. Quotes. This bot multiplies reach per idea."

**4. The Analyst**
> "I don't just post and pray. I track what hits, what dies, and double down on what compounds."

**5. The Automator**
> "Research, scheduling, publishing. The machine runs while I sleep."

---

### [CLOSE - 2:00-2:30]

> "The creators who win in 2025 aren't using AI.
> They're building AI teams.
>
